step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fingers closed into fists and muscles tight as you bring your arms in front of your chest.
Excellent! Fully open your fingers and extend your arms straight out to shoulder height, exhaling as you relax.
Great job maintaining the open hand and extended arm position. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles.
Slightly adjust your arm extension to ensure they are at shoulder height. Keep the fingers open and muscles relaxed.
Good completion of the first repetition. Focus on a smooth transition back to the starting position for the next rep.
Second rep starting well. Ensure fists are fully closed and muscles are tight as you bring arms in.
Nicely done opening fingers and extending arms. Exhale fully and relax the muscles as you reach out.
Keep up the good form! Ensure arms are extended straight horizontally and fingers are wide open.
Ensure your arms are reaching out to shoulder height. Relax your muscles as you exhale and extend.
Excellent work completing the second repetition. You're doing a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to fully close your fists and tighten muscles when bringing arms in, then open fingers wide and relax as you extend arms horizontally to shoulder height. Keep up the good work!
